about_the_game:
Happy Halloween!
This is a Halloween themed pack of items that are simply for fun. We enjoy celebrating Halloween and made this DLC as a thank you to our fans.

+ Night Shaman Outfit
+ Witch Outfit
+ Pumpkin pet that wanders around and gives off a little bit of heat
detailed_description:
Happy Halloween!
This is a Halloween themed pack of items that are simply for fun. We enjoy celebrating Halloween and made this DLC as a thank you to our fans.

+ Night Shaman Outfit
+ Witch Outfit
+ Pumpkin pet that wanders around and gives off a little bit of heat
name: Praey for the Gods - Halloween Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 or AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3,4 GHz, AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 or AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: This is a Halloween Themed pack of items. + Night Shaman Outfit + Witch Outfit + Pumpkin pet that wanders around and gives off a little bit of heat
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Romanian, Swedish
